    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Psychology of Creativity &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Jul 6, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/psychofcreativity
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

       </a>

       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">
        </span>

         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
          <tr>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">

    <div id="commentslistp5809661" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21951418">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21951418">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21951418">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting started with reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21951418">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Both Oxford Art Online and Wikipedia may serve as a very helpful gateway to more in-depth sources. Pay close attention to any recommendations/references to books, articles, etc. about your photographer!
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21951418" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25419497">
              <a id="link_25419497" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419497,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxfordâ€™s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25419539">
              <a id="link_25419539" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_photographers" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419539,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25419539}); ">
               List of Notable Photographers (Wikipedia)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21951419">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21951419">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21951419">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding book-length biographies
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21951419">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Don't forget to use Oxford Art Online and Wikipedia as a gateway to more in-depth sources. Consult their reference lists and suggestions for further reading to find books, etc. about your photographer! Plug those titles into Encompass Search to locate full-text online or in print, or to requrest the items through interlibrary loan.
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21951419" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25419540">
              <a id="link_25419540" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419540,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13011356}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books, scholarly journals, and more. To find only books, use the Books limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability. For items not in Trexler Library, use the Interlibrary Loan button to request a copy from another library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25419499">
              <a id="link_25419499" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419499,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25419499}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21951420">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21951420">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21951420">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding interviews and/or news articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21951420">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Don't forget to use Oxford Art Online and Wikipedia as a gateway to more in-depth sources. Consult their reference lists and suggestions for further reading to find articles, etc. about your photographer! Plug those titles into Encompass Search to locate full-text online or in print, or to requrest the items through interlibrary loan.
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21951420" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25419502">
              <a id="link_25419502" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419502,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25419501">
              <a id="link_25419501" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25419504">
              <a id="link_25419504" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419504,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21951445">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21951445">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21951445">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Cite your sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21951445">
          <div id="boxatt21951445" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25419524">
              <a id="link_25419524" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419524,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology of Creativity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25419524}); ">
               Cite Sources
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find information on how to cite your sources and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">

  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
